loans.name: Lien

texts.vi: Chị Dương ThịLiên 50 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương  từ năm 1998. Vòng vốn đầu tiên chị Liên vay 500.000đ để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi. Hiện nay ngoài chăn nuôi theo mô hình trang trại gia đình chị còn có thêm nghề làm đậu phụ. Đây cũng là những công việc đem lại cho gia đình chị thu nhập 6.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 20.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm lợn về chăn nuôi và mua thêm đỗ về làm đậu phụ bán.
texts.en:
Ms. D. Thi Lien is 50 Yrs old, and joined TYM fund in 1998. Her first loan was 28 USD to invest in raising animals. Currently, in addition to raising animals she also has a business making tofu. These businesses bring in for her family average of 345 USD per month. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 1150 USD to purchase additional pigs to raise, and to buy additional soy bean for making tofu

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Adeleke

texts.en: Adeleke O. sells video CD's (VCD’S). He is 38 years old and married with 5 children. He is requesting a loan amount of N100000 to purchase more VCD’S to sell. He says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more VCD’S

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 48 years old and married with 5 children. She sells foodstuffs and drinks. She is requesting a loan in the amount of N30000 to purchase more foodstuffs and drinks to sell. She says thanks to all kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more drinks and foodstuffs to sell

loans.name: Bui Thi

texts.vi: Chị Bùi Thị Sáu 40 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương  từ năm 1999. Hiện tịa công việc đem lại thu nhập chiín cho gia đình chị là từ chăn nuôi lợn. Bên cạnh đó chồng chị còn làm thêm dịch vụ máy cày và chở hàng thuê nên hàng tháng thu nhập của gia điìn chị rất ổn định với mức 6.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 20.000.000đ để đầu tư sửa chữa chuồng trại và mua thêm lợn về nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bùi Thị Sáu, 40 years old, has participated in the TYM Fund since 1999. Currently, the main source of income for her family is raising pigs. In addition, her husband earns money providing plowing services and transporting goods, so each month the total income of the family is very reliable at about 6,000,000 VND (345 USD). In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 20,000,000 VND (1150 USD) to repair her pigpen and buy more pigs to raise.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising pigs

loans.name: Chatarine

texts.en:
Chatarine K. is currently in the business of selling charcoal and is requesting a loan to expand her business.  Chatarine is 45 years old and is widowed.   She has 3 children and her children go to school.  With the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to pay school fees.  

BRAC's holistic approach to poverty alleviation and empowerment of the poor encompasses a range of core programs in economic and social development, health, education , and human rights and legal services which are delivered through an extensive network of village organizations. BRAC has become one of the world's largest NGOs as a measured by the scale and diversity of its interventions.  In 2007, BRAC started operations in Southern Sudan. The microfinance program, which is targeted towards returning war refugees, has already formed 418 village organizations with more than 14,000 women members.

loans.use: To expand her charcoal business

loans.name: Elizerbeth

texts.en:
Elizerbeth A. is currently in the business of selling simsim and beans and is requesting a loan to expand her business.  Elizerbeth is 40 years old and is widowed.   She has 2 children and her children go to school.  With the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to expand the business. 

BRAC's holistic approach to poverty alleviation and empowerment of the poor encompasses a range of core programs in economic and social development, health, education , and human rights and legal services which are delivered through an extensive network of village organizations. BRAC has become one of the world's largest NGOs as a measured by the scale and diversity of its interventions.  In 2007, BRAC started operations in Southern Sudan. The microfinance program, which is targeted towards returning war refugees, has already formed 418 village organizations with more than 14,000 women members.

loans.use: To expand her food business

loans.name: Enachi

texts.en: Enachi Grigore is 34 years old. He is married and has a son. For 7 years Grigore has farmed his land, together with the help of his wife. He is planning to sow potatoes, melons, tomatoes and many other vegetables on his land. He is requesting this loan to purchase potato seed and mineral fertilizer to strengthen the soil. Grigore is asking for a loan of $950 USD with a term of 12 months. You could become an important part in Grigore family's life, he deeply appreciates the trust and support you are giving him. MicroInvest also has trust in this client and Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase potato seed and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Rossana

texts.es: Rossana tiene 43 años, desde hace un par de años vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo y a su hijo a quienes ama. Ella es una dama muy trabajadora, se dedica todo el día en la atención del servicio higiénico del mercado que está situado cerca de su domicilio. Las ganancias obtenidas con esta actividad le ayudaron a instalar un pequeño negocio de venta de productos de aseo personal como: shampoo, jabón y papales higiénicos, con lo cual incrementó sus ingresos económicos para su casa. Ella inicia sus labores desde muy tempranas horas, pues hay que tener el baño limpio y al servicio de las personas, labor que realiza todos los días de 6 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, pues hay que estar pendiente de que los servicios estén habilitados para su uso. Para el futuro Rossana desea instalar una librería, ya que es uno de los  sueños que tiene junto a su esposo y esperan que aquel día esté próximo. Este es su 7 séptimo crédito y está muy contenta por el grupo de amistades con quienes viene trabajando, pues entre ellas siempre tratan de apoyarse, y nos dice que gracias a MFP tienen un apoyo institucional y amical. Con el dinero solicitado tiene pensado invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de productos para mejorar sus ingresos y seguir ahorrando para cumplir su deseo de tener un negocio grande y próspero.
texts.en:
Rossana is 43 years old. For about two years she has lived with her husband and beloved son in the home that she owns. She is a hard working lady who spends the whole day servicing the restrooms in the market that is located near her home. Her income from this activity helped her set up a small business selling personal care supplies such as shampoo, soap, and feminine hygiene products, which which she has increased the family income. She begins her workday very early in the morning, because she must clean the restrooms and make them ready for the users. She works from 6AM to 6PM every day, because she must make sure that the services are always in good shape. In the future, Rossana would like to open an office supply store, which has been a long-time dream of her and her husband, hoping that the day won't be far for this dream to be realized. This is her seventh loan, and she is very happy for the group of friends with whom she has worked, because everyone tries to offer each other support, as well as the invaluable institutional support from MFP. The money requested will be used to buy the largest supply of products to improve her sales and continue to save so that her dream of owning a large and prosperous business will come true.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Incremento de su mercadería

loans.name: Phan Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Phan Thị Cơ năm nay 56 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2008. Hiện tại gia đình chị đang nuôi cá và buôn bán cát đã xây dựng. Công việc chăn nuôi, buôn bán của gia đình chị đang phát triển tốt và đem lại cho gia đình chị thu nhập 4.000.000đ/ thnág.
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 5.000.000đ để đầu tư mở rộng bến bãi nhằm phục vụ cho công việc  kinh doanh của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Phan Thị Cơ, 56 years old, has participated in the TYM Fund since 2008. Currently, she and her family raise fish and sell sand and stone for use in construction. Both the fish-farming business and the construction materials business are doing well, together earning the family about 4,000,000 VND (240 USD) per month. In the next lending cycle, she hopes to borrow 5,000,000 VND (300 USD) to expand their riverfront landing in order to improve their business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sand and stone and fishfarming businesses

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 43 años, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en la casa que su madre le dejó como herencia. A ella siempre le gustó las diversas prendas de vestir, sobre todo las que su hija le enviaba del extranjero, pero con el tiempo se dio cuenta que las telas eran muy buenas y que atraía la atención de las personas y empezó a vender algunos vestidos en su círculo de amigas. Es así que inició su negocio de venta de ropa hace 7 años y trabaja junto a sus dos hijas quienes le envían las diversas prendas que doña Rosa entrega a sus diversas clientas. Este negocio está siendo muy rentable por los diseños novedosos y por los precios adecuados que tienen, pues  desea incrementar sus clientes y lo mejor es ofreciéndoles prendas que estén al alcance de cada persona. En el futuro desea tener un stand donde pueda atender a sus clientes y exhibir la ropa que vende. Este es su décimo préstamo, Rosa ha estado trabajando en coordinación con sus compañeras de grupo, pues lo que les caracteriza es su organización dentro de MFP. Con el dinero que solicita enviará a sus hijas para que le manden prendas de moda para el verano, comprará en cantidad para abaratar costos.
texts.en:
Rosa is 43 years old, lives with her husband and four children in the home that her mother left her as inheritance. She always liked clothes, particularly those that her daughter would ship to her from overseas, but in time she realized that the fabrics were of very good quality and would attract the attention of many, so she began to sell some of her dresses among her circle of friends. That is how her clothing sales business got started seven years ago. She now works with her two daughters who ship to her a variety of clothing articles that Mrs. Rosa sells to her many clients. This business has become very lucrative due to the novelty of the designs and the convenient prices of the garments, making them accessible to everyone. In the future she would like to setup a stand where she can better serve her clients and also show the clothes that she sells. This is her tenth loan; Rosa has been working in coordination with her group peers, because they are known to be very organized within MFP. With the money requested she will sent funds to her daughters for the purchase of summer clothes in larger quantities in order to minimize the costs.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Incremento de su mercadería

loans.name: Cojocaru

texts.en: N. is a business woman in the town where she lives. She is 64 years old and currently earns an average monthly profit of $200. Every day she works at her business from 7:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. She is requesting a loan to buy more pumpkin seeds so she can buy more items for her business. She hopes, that through this loan, her profit will increase and she will be able to grow her business. N. is married and has two children. She must support her children even when her profits are low.

loans.use: to grow her business

loans.name: Hoang Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Hoàng Thị L. năm nay 56 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2004. Hiện tại công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị là từ chăn nuôi và kinh doanh dịch vụ đám cưới ( Cho thuê, loa đài, bát đĩa). Với mức thu nhập  3.000.000đ/ tháng kinh tế gia đình chị đang ngày càng ổn định và phát triển.
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm bàn ghế, bát đĩa phục vụ cho công việc kinh doanh của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Hoàng Thị L., 56 years old, has participated in the TYM Fund since 2004. Currently, the family earns money from raising animals and from a business renting out supplies for weddings (audio equipment, plates and bowls). With their income of 3,000,000 VND (172 USD) per month, the financial situation of the family is becoming more secure and continues to improve. In the next round of lending, she hopes to borrow 10,000,000 VND (575 USD) to buy tables and chairs and more plates and bowls to use in their business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Wedding supplies rental business

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 44 años, es viuda y vive sola en su propia casa. A pesar de las adversidades, siempre tuvo la fuerza de salir adelante, muestra de ello es el puesto que logró adquirir hace 5 años, donde se dedica a vender CDs música y video de todo genero. Gracias a su afición por la música cubre las expectativas de sus clientes, quienes todos los días pasan por el mercado para adquirir algunos CDs y DVDs del puesto de doña Rosa, quien siempre les espera con una gran sonrisa. Para ella, su trabajo es la única forma de estar animada, pues está rodeada de varias personas que atiende y le alegran el día, además sus ventas son muy buenas por la gran demanda que hay en la zona y cubren la inversión de la  mercadería que compra al por mayor en el centro de la ciudad. En el futuro Rosa desea instalar nuevos puestos de venta en el mercado y tener ingresos adicionales para sus gastos y ahorros que es la prioridad para mantenerse en su vejez. Este es su quinceavo préstamo con MFP, donde tuvo la oportunidad para progresar juntamente con sus amistades quienes conforman su banco comunal. Con el dinero que solicita comprará mayor cantidad de mercadería, pues tiene la necesidad  de adquirir CDs y DVDs de estreno, ya que los cambios son muy rápidos en el ámbito de la música y el cine.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 44-year-old widow who lives alone in her own home. She always finds the strength to overcome the obstacles she faces. Proof of this is the position she got 5 years ago, selling CDs and music videos of all kinds. Thanks to her fondness for music, she is able to meet her customers’ expectations. The customers come to the market every day to buy a few CDs or DVDs from Ms. Rosa, who always greets them with a big smile. For Rosa, her job is the only way she finds motivation, since she is surrounded by people who care for her and make her day happier. Also, since there is a large demand for music in her region, her sales are good enough to cover the cost of the merchandise she buys at a wholesale price in downtown Lima. In the future Rosa would like to open new booths in the market to create additional income for her expenses and savings. Her priority is to support herself as she ages. This is her 15th loan with MFP, where she has had the opportunity to grow along with her fellow members of the community bank. With this loan money she will buy new-release CDs and DVDs, which is important since things change quickly in the music and film industries.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: purchase DVDs and CDs

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma tiene 39 años, vive con su esposo y su hijo en la casa que lograron construir a base de mucho esfuerzo. Ella es una mujer muy activa, según la temporada vende diversos productos que estén de acorde  a la demanda, pues sabe que la moda o las fechas festivas son clave para invertir en mercadería, es por eso que no tiene un producto de venta específico. Cada semana, comercia sus productos en las ciudades más cercanas a su distrito, lo cual le demanda costos operativos altos, pero los cubre con las ganancias que tiene, pues el precio de sus productos son adecuados para obtener buenas ganancias. Norma tiene el anhelo de instalar una pequeña bodega en su casa y dejar de movilizarse de un lado para otro para vender sus artículos, aunque también le agrada conocer nuevos lugares y otras provincias de su país, pero lo difícil es tener que cargar con toda la mercadería para ello. Norma tiene un año trabajando con MFP, y desde que ingresó tuvo el apoyo para mejorar su negocio y relacionarse con las personas con quienes viene trabajando tan amenamente en su banco comunal. El dinero que solicita esta vez es para la compra de útiles escolares y aprovechar la campaña, ya que las clases se inician en marzo.
texts.en:
Norma is 39 and lives with her husband and son in the home that they were able to build with great effort. She is a very active woman—depending on the season she sells various products that satisfy her customers’ demands. She knows that holidays and fashion trends are key when investing in merchandise, which is why she does not only sell one specific thing. Every week she sells her merchandise in nearby cities. She has high operational costs but those are covered by the profit she makes from selling her products at a good price. Norma would like to open a small general store in her home so she can stop traveling from place to place selling her products. Although she likes visiting new places and other states in her country, it is very difficult to transport her products to these new places. Norma has been working with MFP for one year and has found the needed support to improve her business and get to know the other people who work with this community bank. The loan money will be used to buy school supplies to sell to students—she wants to take advantage of the fact that classes begin in March.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: School supplies for resale

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị Mạnh năm nay 48 tuổi, gia đình chị có 3 người con  đã trưởng thành. Năm 2008 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi vịt, cá. Hiện tại gia đình chị  đang chăn nuôi 700 con vịt  và 5 sào ao nuôi cá cho thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng.
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 9.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm 100 con gà và thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Mạnh, 48 years old, has three grown children. In 2008 she used a loan from the TYM Fund to invest in raising ducks and fish. She and her family now have 700 ducks and 5 sào (1 sào = 360 square meters) of fish ponds, from which they earn an income of 5,000,000 VND (292 USD) per month. In the next round of lending, she hopes to borrow 9,000,000 VND (525 USD) to buy 100 chickens and animal feed.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising chickens

loans.name: María

texts.es: María tiene 24 años, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijas en su casa que tanto trabajo le costó adquirir. Desde muy pequeña se dedicó a las ventas, pues estuvo trabajando en múltiples actividades que le enseñaron a desenvolverse como una muy buena comerciante, desde que se casó, hace 5 años, inició su negocio propio junto a su esposo, quien le ayuda en la venta de frutas y jugos. Ambos salen a vender desde las 6 de la mañana en la calle, pues poseen una triciclo que les sirve de movilidad para trasladarse con su negocio a los lugares públicos más concurridos; como hospitales, colegios y mercados, este trayecto les toma todo el día, donde María, junto a su esposo y sus hijas van recorriendo toda su localidad, lo cual es muy fatigado por el calor, pero esta familia no deja de agradecer por tener una oportunidad de trabajo, pues saben que con el tiempo podrán obtener la tiendita o el puesto que desean para vender sus jugos y frutas. María viene trabajando con MFP desde hace un año, este es su segundo crédito, lo que le ha ayudado para comprar su mercadería. Con el dinero que ahora solicita comprará cajones de frutas, los cuales adquiere en el mercado central de la ciudad, pues los costos son más cómodos.
texts.en:
Maria is 24 and lives with her husband and two children in their home that was very hard for them to get. From a young age she worked in sales, working in several jobs that taught her to be a good businesswoman. When she married 5 years ago, she started a business with her husband, who helps her sell fruit and fruit juice. They both leave the house at 6:00 am on their tricycle, which serves as their means of transportation. They travel around the city selling fruit in the busiest places in the city, like hospitals, high schools and markets. Maria, her husband and their children travel around together the whole day, which is very tiresome due to the heat. However, this family is beyond grateful to have the opportunity to work and they know that in time they will be able to open a small store to sell their juices and fruits from. Maria has been working with MFP for one year and this is her second loan, which will help her buy fruit. She will buy crates of fruit in the downtown market since the prices are more affordable there.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buy fruit

loans.name: Esther

texts.en:
Esther G. is in the business of selling fish and beans at the market and is requesting a loan to expand her business.  Esther is 45 years old and is widowed.   She has 1 child and her child do not go to school.  With the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to expand her business. 

BRAC's holistic approach to poverty alleviation and empowerment of the poor encompasses a range of core programs in economic and social development, health, education , and human rights and legal services which are delivered through an extensive network of village organizations. BRAC has become one of the world's largest NGOs as a measured by the scale and diversity of its interventions.  In 2007, BRAC started operations in Southern Sudan. The microfinance program, which is targeted towards returning war refugees, has already formed 418 village organizations with more than 14,000 women members.

loans.use: Expand her food selling business

loans.name: María

texts.es: María es casada, vive con su esposo, hijas y nietas en la casa que heredó de sus padres. Ella es toda una empresaria, pues desde hace 10 años que murió su madre se dedicó a atender  el puesto que ella dejó, aprendiendo muy rápido el movimiento que hay en los mercados, logrando así incrementar su capital de trabajo, lo que le dio oportunidad de atender pedidos mayores y viéndose en la necesidad de contratar a dos personas que la puedan ayudar en la venta de carne de pollo y en la entrega propicia de los pedidos que tiene para algunos restaurantes de su localidad. A pesar de estar todos los días en la misma actividad, ocuparse en su trabajo la llena de vitalidad, aunque lo cansado es trasladar estos pedidos a lugares muy lejanos, por ello, es que su próxima meta es adquirir un carro que no solo le facilite las cosas, sino también que la ayude a incrementar sus ingresos y dejar de pagar el transporte diario que gasta hasta hoy. María está en su décimo préstamo con MFP, desde hace 6 años, lo cual le agrada pues  encontró, no tan solo a mujeres dentro de su banco comunal, sino que encontró amigas, que es lo más importante. Invertirá 1000 soles en la compra de mayor cantidad de pollos para atender los pedidos que tiene.
texts.en:
Maria is married and lives with her husband, daughters and grand-daughters in the home that she inherited from her parents. She is a businesswoman—when her mother died 10 years ago, Maria took over the store she left behind. She had to quickly learn the rhythm of the market and how to increase her capital. Increasing her capital gave her the opportunity to complete more orders and hire 2 people to help her. She sells chicken and also delivers it to several nearby restaurants. Even though every day the work is the same, her job gives her energy. However, it is tiresome to make deliveries that are far away; because of this, her next goal is to purchase a car. This will make her job easier and also help her increase her profit and stop paying for transportation every day. This is Maria’s 10th loan with MFP in the past 6 years. She is very grateful and she found not only other members within her community bank, but actual friends, which is the most important thing. She will invest 1,000 soles in wholesale chickens to fill the orders that she has.

Translated from Spanish by Rachel Crouch, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: chickens

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi: Chị Phạm Thị Huế  năm nay 31  tuổi, gia đình chị có 2 người con  trong đó có 1 con đang tuổi đến trường.  Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ đầu năm 2008. Hiện tại chị buôn bán thịt lợn ở chợ còn chồng chị làm thợ cơ khí với thu nhập 4.000.000đ/ tháng. Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 9.000.000đ  một phần chị sử dụng để đầu tư mua thêm nguyên liệu ( sắt) phục vụ cho công việc hàn xì của chồng, phần còn lại chị sử dụng để đầu tư thêm vốn cho công việc buôn bán thịt lợn.
texts.en:
Mrs. Phạm Thị Huế, 31 years old, has two children, one of whom is old enough to go to school. She has participated in the TYM Fund since 2008. Currently, she earns money selling pork at the market and her husband works as a mechanic, with a total income of 4,000,000 VND (233 USD) per month. In the next round of lending, she hopes to borrow 9,000,000 VND (525 USD). She will use part of the loan to buy materials (iron) for her husband’s welding work, and the remainder she will invest in her pork-selling business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Welding supplies, pork selling

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị M.  năm nay 58 tuổi, gia đình chị có 5 người con đã trưởng thành và có công việc làm ổn định. Năm 2002 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương  và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi và bán hàng tạp hoá. Hiện nay thu nhạp chính của gia đình chị là từ chăn nuôi, buôn bán và sự hỗ trợ của các con  với  thu nhập 6.000.000đ/ tháng.
 Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 20.000.000đ một phần chị sử dụng để mua thêm lợn về nuôi, phần còn lại chị sẽ sử dụng để kinh doanh hàng tạp hoá.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị M. is 58 years old. She has five grown children who all have steady employment. In 2002, she became a member of the TYM Fund and used a loan to invest in raising animals and selling groceries. Currently, Mrs. M.’s income comes mainly from raising animals and selling groceries, and she also receives support from her children. In total her income is about 6,000,000 VND (345 USD). In the next round of lending, she hopes to borrow 20,000,000 VND (1150 USD). She will use part of the loan to buy more pigs to raise, and the remainder she will invest in her grocery shop.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising pigs, grocery shop

loans.name: Thi My

texts.vi: Chị Đỗ Thị Mý  năm nay 27 tuổi, . Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương  từ năm 2000. Hiêệntịa công việc đem alị thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị là từ chăn nuôi lợn gà, làm đậu phụ và tiền công làm thợ hàn xì của chồng. Các dự án tăng thu nhập củag ia đình chị đang phát triển tốt và cho thu nhập 6.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ một phần chị sử dụng để mua thêm lợn về nuôi, phần còn lại chị sẽ sử dụng để mua thêm nguyên liệu phục vụ cho công việc làm đậu phụ của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. D. Thi My, 27 years old, joined the TYM Fund in 2000. Currently, the main source of income for her family comes from raising livestock, making tofu, and her husband's wage from oxyacetylene welding. Her projects to increase income have been going well, yelding an average monthly income of 6 millions VND. This time, she would like to borrow 10 millions VND, partly to purchase more pigs to rear, partly to purchase ingredients to make tofu.

Translated from Vietnamese by Yen Thanh Pham, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing tofu ingredients

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị Nguyên 62 tuổi, gia đình chị có hai con đã trưởng thành. đầu năm 2008 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu  tư vào  buôn bán hoa quả.  Hiện nay hàng tháng ngoài thu nhập từ buôn bán gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn hỗ trợ từ các con nên kinh tế gia đình chị rất ổn định.
 Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 7.000.000đ  để đầu tư mua thêm hoa quả về bán.
texts.en:
Mrs. N. Thi N. is 62 years old. Her family has two grown-up children. In early 2008, she joined TYM Fund and borrowed money to trade fruits. Currently, in addition to income from fruit trading, she receives financial support from her children, therefore the economic situation of her family is very stable. In this loan cycle, she wishes to borrow VND7,000,000 to buy more fruits to resell.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fruits to resell

loans.name: Sugac

texts.en: Sugac S. is 29 years old, married, and has two children.  Her main activity is agriculture, namely growing and selling fruits and vegetables. She has had this business for three years, having started at the suggestion of her husband, who also is a farmer. Her intention is to maintain her source of income but now she does not have enough resources. She decided to request a loan through Micro Invest. She would like to finance this through Kiva. She wants to strengthen her poultry and grocery store business so that it can continue to offer what her customers demand.

loans.use: to increase resources and strengthen her busness

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La sr. SUSANA, es nuestra socia, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo real en el distrito de Zurite de la provincia de Anta, está ubicado a 1 y 40 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco; la socia tiene 46 años de edad, ella tiene 4 hijos de, 28,24,22,18 años.

Ella se dedica entre sus actividades domésticas a la crianza de 04 vacas de raza Holstein, las mismas que le producen leche, elaboración de quesos y quesillos, yogurt, manjar blanco; que ella lleva a la ciudad del Cusco los días sábados y domingos para poderlos vender en los diferentes mercados locales.

Ella desea destinar el préstamo a la compra de 2 vacas holstein, para así tener mayor producción y poco a poco seguir comprando más vacas.

La socia agradece mucho y valora mucho el apoyo y préstamo, por que en la zona donde ella vive no hay accesibilidad a una banca financiera, por lo que está comprometida a devolver el préstamo en el plazo determinado.
texts.en:
Mrs.Susana is our communal bank member. She lives in the community of Tombo Real in the district of Zurite of the providence of Anta, which is located one hour and forty minutes from the city of Cuzco; she is 46 years old and she has four children of the ages of 28, 24, 22 and 18 years old. She raises four cows of the Holstein breed, the same cows that produce milk to make cheese, yogurt and condensed milk. She uses the milk to make these products and sells them in the city of Cuzco every Saturday and Sunday in different markets. She wishes to get this loan so she can buy two more cows and that way she will have more product to sell. Our member is very thankful for the help and loans she has been given because in the area that she is located there are no banks. She is committed to pay back the loan over a set amount of time.

(Translated by Sonia of San Roque High School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy milk cows

loans.name: Omolola

texts.en: Omolola A. is 33 years old and married with 2 children. She sells provisions like noodles, butter, milk, etc. She requests the loan amount of N50000 to purchase more provisions to sell. She hopes to expand her business. She says thank you.

loans.use: To purchase more provisions to sell

loans.name: Lucía

texts.es: Lucía tiene 45 años, es casada y vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos en su casa propia. A ella siempre le agradó la administración y deseó tener un negocio propio que sea próspero el cual pueda administrar, y sus anhelos se hicieron realidad hace 8 años, cuando a base de mucho esfuerzo y de trabajar fuera de casa, pudo juntar el dinero necesario para instalar su propia tienda en su domicilio, la cual gracias a su buena administración marcha muy bien, pues todos los días se levanta muy temprano para hacer la limpieza del local y esté accesible para la atención desde muy temprano, debido a que las madres de familia salen muy temprano a realizar sus compras para la preparación de sus alimentos. Sin embargo, lo dificultoso es que el espacio se torna más pequeño cada vez, para el futuro desea ampliar su tienda, ya que sería una muy buena inversión, pues sus clientes son muy leales y siempre hay nueva clientela que atender de la mejor manera. Ella viene trabajando con MFP desde hace 6 años, este es su quinceavo préstamo y siempre pudo mantener una muy buena comunicación con sus compañeras, pues son muy buenas amigas lo que da la base sólida a su grupo. Con el dinero que solicita adquirirá una congeladora para ofrecer bebidas heladas este verano.
texts.en:
Lucía is 45 years old, married, and lives with her husband and their three children. She has always enjoyed management and hoped to have her own prosperous business, and her dreams became reality eight years ago. With much effort and work outside the home, she was able to pull together enough money to install her own store in her home, and thanks to her good management skills it is still doing well. Every day she wakes up very early to do laundry and makes herself available for customer care, because mothers leave very early to do their grocery shopping. The difficult thing, however, is that the space is becoming smaller and smaller. In the future, she hopes to expand her store, which would be a great investment since her clients are very loyal and there are always new customers to serve. She has been working with MFP for six years. This is her 15th loan and she has always maintained good communication with her colleagues--their friendship forms a solid base for the group. With this money, she will buy a refrigerator so she can offer beverages this summer.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a refrigerator for beverages

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Hà  58 tuổi, chị đang sống cùng chồng là thương binh và 1 con đã trưởng thành tại huyện Ninh Giang tỉnh Hải Dương . Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2003. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị là từ buôn  bán hoa quả. Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu từ lương của chồng nên  kinh tế gia đình chị rất ổn định với mức thu nhập 2.500.000.đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 6.000.000đ  để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh hoa quả của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi H. is 58 years old. She is living with her husband (a war-disabled vet) and one grown-up children in Ninh Giang district, Hai Duong province. She has participated in the TYM Fund since 2003. Currently, fruits reselling is the business that brings the main source of income for her family. In addition, her family receives the pension of the husband, therefore the economic situation of her family is very stable with an average income of VND2,500,000 per month.

In this loan cycle, she wishes to borrow VND6,000,000 to buy more fruits to resell.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fruits to resell

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: Lidia, es una señorita de 65 años, vive con su hermana de 55 años en la casa que heredaron de su padre. Siempre estuvo interesada en la elaboración de adornos de decoración y su hermana le enseñó a confeccionar estos y a tejer, pues juntas tiene un taller de costura dentro de su domicilio. Lidia anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa contable, pero desde que se jubiló, puso en práctica las enseñanzas de su hermana, y hace 10 años viene trabajando en la confección y venta de ropa por  temporada, la cual lleva a sus amistades, quienes alegremente esperan la visita de tan agradable dama que les ofrece diversas prendas y algunos adornos que puedan decorar su vivienda. Este negocio es muy rentable, gracias a la creatividad que tiene para realizar cada artículo de manera novedosa y buen gusto. Lidia y su hermana anhelan incrementar su taller con nuevas máquinas que agilicen y mejoren su producción. Hace 8 años que viene trabajando con MFP, este es su décimo préstamo, y está muy contenta con el gran equipo que formó entre sus vecinas quienes vienen trabajando en forma conjunta. Con el dinero que solicita comprara materiales para sus confecciones y algunas prendas de vestir para seguir trabajando en este negocio que tanto la satisface.
texts.en:
Lidia is 65 years old and lives with her 55-year-old sister in the house they inherited from their father. She has always been interested in making ornamental decorations and her sister taught her how to make these and to knit. Together, they have a sewing workshop in their home. Before, Lidia worked in an accounting firm, but since she retired, she has put into practice what she has learned from her sister. For 10 years, she has worked to make and sell seasonal clothing. This has led to new friends, who eagerly await her visits when she brings clothing and decorations for their homes. This business is very profitable, thanks to the creativity with which she crafts each item of novelty and good taste. Lidia and her sister wish to expand their workshop with new machines that will expedite and improve their production. She has worked with MFP for the past eight years. This is her 10th loan, and she is very happy with the great team she has formed with her neighbors. With this money, she will buy materials for her creations and some clothing so she can continue to work on this business, which brings her so much satisfaction.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase materials for crafts and clothing to sell

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi: Chị Phạm Thị L. năm nay  58 tuổi, chị đang sống cùng chồng và 1 con  tại huyện Ninh Giang tỉnh Hải Dương . Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2004. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị là từ trồng rau và nuôi cá . Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu sự hỗ trợ của các con . Với thu nhập  2.500.000.đ/ tháng gia đình chị đang ngày càng có điều kiện hơn để cải thiện cuộc sống.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 20.000.000đ  để đầu tư mua thêm cá giống, gà giống và thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pham Thi L. is 58 years old. She is living with her husband and child in Ninh Giang district, Hai Duong province. She has participated in TYM Fund since 2004. Currently, the major source of income of her family is from growing vegetables and raising fishes. In addition, she also receives financial support from her children. With an income of VND2,500,000 per month, her family has the resources to improve the condition of living.

In this loan cycle, she wishes to borrow VND20,000,000 to buy more baby fishes, baby chickens, and foods for them.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: buy more baby fishes, baby chickens to raise, and foods for them.

loans.name: Adesola

texts.en: Adesola A. is a shoe maker. He makes men and womens shoes. He is 40 years old and married with 3 children. Adesola requests the loan amount of N50000 to purchase more materials for making shoes. He says thanks to all kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more materials to make shoes to sell

loans.name: Laura

texts.es: Laura tiene 44 años, es casada, vive con su pareja y su hijo en una casa alquilada. Sus ganas de progresar la llevaron a incursionar en el comercio, lo cual aprendió de unas amistades que desde muy joven le enseñaron a cómo se trabajar con las diversas líneas de belleza, negocio que aprendió con mucho agrado y esmero mostrando siempre paciencia en su práctica. Pero desde hace 10 años logró tener gran cantidad de clientes con quienes supo simpatizar por su buen carácter, logrando incrementar sus ventas. Pero para cumplir su record de venta sale todas las mañanas hasta el medio días en busca de nuevas clientas, lo cual le agrada pues dentro de esta actividad, lo mejor es conocer a nuevas personas con quienes se puede entablar una bonita amistad, pero lo desagradable es tener que caminar varias horas por las calles para entregar los pedidos o para realizar las cobranzas, que por lo habitual lo realiza en las tardes. Laura tiene pensado abrir una pequeña tienda, pues también le agrada realizar bocaditos que usualmente prepara para diversas reuniones sociales. Hace 6 años que trabaja con MFP, este es su décimo préstamo y siempre se mostró empeñosa por aprender y colaborar, lo cual es una de las características de cada una de las clientes su grupo. Con los 2000 soles que solicita tiene pensado comprar mayor cantidad de productos para su stock que puede vender desde su hogar de forma inmediata y no hacer esperar demasiado a sus clientas hasta la llegada de los pedidos.
texts.en:
Laura is 44 years old, married, and lives with her partner and their child in a rented house. Her desire to progress led her to break into business, which she learned from a couple of friends. From a young age, they taught her how to work with various beauty lines, which she has learned with great pleasure, always demonstrating patience in her practice. Over the last 10 years her good character has garnered a large clientele, and increased her sales. To be able to reach her sales goals, she goes out every morning until midday in search of new customers. She enjoys this activity, because she is able to meet new people with whom she can begin new friendships, but the downside is having to walk through the streets for hours taking orders or collecting payments, which she usually does in the afternoon. Laura plans to open a small store, because she also enjoys making sandwiches, which she usually does for social gatherings. She has been working with MFP for six years. This is her 10th loan and she has always demonstrated a dedication to learning and collaboration, which is characteristic of all the members of her group. With this loan of 2000 soles, she plans to buy a greater quantity of products to stock, which she can sell immediately from her home without having to wait on orders from her customers.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase commodities for sale

loans.name: Bui Thi

texts.vi: Chị Bùi Thị Nguyệt năm nay  52 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2006. Gia đình chị có 4 con trong đó có 2 con đã trưởng thành và có việc làm ổn định.  Hiện tại chị đang chăn nuôi gà, vịt, cá tại nhà còn chồng chị làm nghề đánh cá. Với mức thu nhập 3.000.000đ/ tháng từ công việc chăn nuôi và đánh bắt cá gia đình chị không chỉ hoàn trả vốn tốt mà còn có thêm điều kiện để cải thiện cuộc sống và đầu tư cho các con ăn học.  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 9.000.000đ một phần chị sử dụng để  đầu tư mua thêm 100 con gà giống và thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi,  phần còn lại chị sẽ sử dụng để mua thêm dụng cụ để đầu tư cho công việc đánh bắt cá của chồng.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bui Thi N. is 52 years old. She has participated in TYM Fund since 2006. She has four children, two of them are adults and have stable jobs. Currently she raises chickens, ducks, fishes at home, and her husband catches fishes. With an income of VND3,000,000 per month from poultry raising and fishing, she not only pays back the loans but also has financial resources to improve living condition and send the young children to school.

In this loan cycle, she wishes to borrow VND9,000,000. She will use part of it to buy 100 baby chickens and foods for them. She will use the remaining part to buy tools and equipment for fishing for her husband to catch fishes.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy 100 baby chickens to raise, and fishing equipment

loans.name: Toki

texts.en: Toki I., 46 years old and married with four children, sells spare motor  parts, and his wife owns a restaurant.  He is requesting the loan amount of N50000 to purchase more spare motor parts to sell. He says thank you to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more spare motor parts to sell.

loans.name: Ricarda

texts.es:
La Sra.Ricarda, es socia nuestra, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo real en el distrito de Zurite de la provincia de Anta, está ubicado a 1 y 40 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco; nuestra socia tiene 42 años de edad y tiene 4 hijos de, 21,18,15 y 11 años.

La socia se dedica a la crianza de animales vacunos, teniendo 08 vacas y a la crianza de animales menores, tiene 15 cuyes, la socia desea mejorar sus jaulas de cuyes y su establo, y comprar un par de vacas más; Ella lleva todos los sábados, los derivados de sus producción a los mercados centrales en la ciudad del Cusco, para su venta.

La socia está muy agradecida y reconoce la ayuda brindada a su persona y se compromete a cubrir todo el préstamo en las fechas estipuladas.
texts.en:
Ricarda is a member of our group. She lives in the Tambo Real community in the Zurite district of the Anta province, which is located 1 hour and 40 minutes from the city of Cusco. She is 42 years old and has 4 children, who are 21, 18, 15 and 11 years of age. She raises cattle, of which she has 8, and smaller animals. She has 15 guinea pigs. She wants to improve the condition of the guinea pig cages and her stable and buy a few more cows. She takes her products every Saturday to sell them at the central markets in the city of Cusco. She is very thankful and recognizes the help given to her. She has committed to paying back the full loan on the specified dates.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy cattle and smaller animals.

loans.name: Lastenia

texts.es: Lastenia tiene 70 años, vive en su casa junto a con su esposo y sus dos hijos. A ella siempre le agradó realizar pasteles y todo lo referente a repostería, pues es el don que tiene, el cual ha estado perfeccionando estudiando desde joven y ahora tiene 20 años dedicándose a la venta de tan deliciosos aperitivos, los cuales son muy solicitados en su localidad, debido a que hay muchas celebraciones para degustar de dulces. Para las fiestas,  recurre doña Lastenia gustosamente a atender pedidos, aunque para cumplir con ellos requiere de mayor inversión para los ingredientes que utiliza. Pero este negocio es muy rentable pues en los eventos sociales el costo por entrega es mayor, lo que la beneficia y suele ganara el doble. Lastenia espera ser muy reconocida en su labor y abrir una fuente de soda en su casa, la cual está aún en construcción. Este es su décimo préstamo con MFP y se muestra muy contenta con el trabajo realizado dentro de su grupo, ya que pudieron organizarse adecuadamente. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ingredientes y productos para preparar sus bocaditos, y espera atender así mayor cantidad de ventas.
texts.en:
Lastenia is 70 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. She has always enjoyed making cakes and all sorts of baked goods--it is a gift, which she has been perfecting through study since she was young. Now she has 20 years of experience selling delicious appetizers, which are very popular in her neighborhood because there are so many celebrations where sweets are enjoyed. For the holidays, Lastenia happily fulfills orders, but to complete them requires more investment in the ingredients she uses. This business is very profitable because the delivery costs for social events are higher, and she can make twice as much. Lastenia hopes to become very well known for her work and open a soda fountain in her house, which is still under construction. This is her 10th loan with MFP, and she is very pleased with the work carried out within her group, which is well organized. She will invest this money in ingredients and produce for preparing sandwiches, and she expects this to increase her sales.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase ingredients for desserts

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es: Jessica tiene 23 años, vive en la casa de sus padres, junto a su esposo y su hijo, pero esperan pronto adquirir su casa propia. Sus ganas de progresar la motivan a seguir trabajando, desde hace 2 años está dedicada a la venta de ropa que realiza todos los días en diversos lugares de su localidad, ya que sale muy temprano para vender su mercadería en los mercados o para dejar algunas prendas en los puestos de algunas amistades quienes muy gustosas le tienden una mano, lo cual es de  gran  ayuda. Jessica está muy contenta, pues las ventas están mejorando gracias al verano, pues hay mayor demanda, y trata de aprovecharla trayendo ropa de verano que deja a sus mejores clientes, quienes le van pagando todos los días. Esta actividad no es muy cansada pues es independiente en cuanto sus horarios, la desventaja es que no tiene un ingreso fijo en su hogar pues son relativas las ganancias que pueda obtener cada día. Por ello, Jessica anhela pronto  tener un puesto donde exhibir sus productos. Viene trabajando con MFP hace 5 años, este es su octavo préstamo con la institución, quien le ayudó no solo a tener un apoyo económico, sino que le brindó la oportunidad de conocer a sus compañeras de grupo, comenta. El dinero solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de mercadería, básicamente para aprovechar la campaña escolar (marzo – abril) e incrementar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Jessica is 23 years old and lives in her parents' house with her husband and son, but they hope to acquire their own house soon. The desire to advance motivates her to continue working, and for 2 years she has sold clothing every day in different parts of her area. She leaves very early in the morning to sell her merchandise in the markets or leave some garments in her friends' stalls, who kindly lend her a hand, which helps a lot. Jessica is very happy because her sales are improving thanks to the summertime. Since there is greater demand, she tries to take advantage of it by bringing summer clothes that she leaves with her best clients, who pay her every day. This practice is not very tiring because she can set her own schedule. The disadvantage is that she doesn't have a fixed income in her home and so the earnings that she can obtain each day are relative. Because of that, Jessica hopes to soon have a stand where she can display her products. She has worked with MFP for 5 years, and this is her eighth loan with the institution, which helped her not only to have economic support, but also to give her the chance to get to know the group members. She will invest the money requested in the purchase of merchandise, basically to take advantage of the school year (March-April) and increase her income.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her merchandise

loans.name: Dao Xuan

texts.vi:
Chị Đào Thị Thuỷ  năm nay  43  tuổi. Năm 2008 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào cửa hàng cắt may. Hiện tại ngoài nguồn thu nhập từ cửa hàng cắt may hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm nguồn thu từ lương hưu của chồng với thu nhập 3.000.000đ/ tháng. 
  Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 8.000.000đ để đầu tư mua vải về cắt may  nhằm phục vụ  nagỳ càng tốt hơn nhu cầu của bà con địa phương.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dao Thi T. is 43 years old. In 2008, she joined TYM Fund and borrowed money to invest in a tailor shop. Currently, in addition to the income from the tailor shop her family also receives pension of her husband. The income of her family is VND3,000,000 per month.

In this loan cycle, she wishes to borrow VND8,000,000 to buy more textiles for tailoring to serve the needs of the local community.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy textiles for tailoring

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor tiene 46 años, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijas en la casa que terminaron de construir hace poco tiempo atrás. Ella se considera una gran empresaria dentro de las líneas de belleza donde trabaja hace 15 años, siempre cubre sus metas de venta, obteniendo premios por su buen desempeño, lo cual la motiva a seguir trabajando por mucho más tiempo y tener proyección a futuro en base a esta actividad, pues le agrada conocer a muchas personas y relacionarse con gran diversidad de clientas ofreciéndoles productos de belleza. Esta actividad la realiza todos los días a partir de las  8 de la mañana, sale a visitar a sus clientas con sus diversos catálogos y en las tardes solo se dedica a la distribución de los pedidos y las cobranzas, que siempre es lo más tedioso para ella. En el futuro Flor desea tener un bazar en su casa para exponer sus productos de belleza y que estén al alcance de todas las mujeres de su localidad. Este es su dieciochoavo préstamo, lo que la hace una cliente fiel de MFP, pues es una de las clientes fundadoras de la institución en esta zona. Con el dinero solicitado comprará más productos de belleza en promoción, lo que favorecen a toda promotora para incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Flor is 46 years old and lives with her husband and four daughters in the house they built a while back. She is considered an astute businesswoman with regard to the lines of beauty products she has sold for the last 15 years. She consistently makes her sales goals, winning prizes for her good performance. This motivates her to continue working and to develop future sales projections. She enjoys being involved with her diverse customer base and being able to offer them beauty products. Every day, starting at 8:00 in the morning, she leaves with a variety of catalogs to visit her customers. Late afternoons are dedicated to the distribution of orders and bill collection, something that is always more tedious for her. In the future, Flor wants to have a shop at her house to display her beauty products, one that would be accessible to all the neighborhood women. This is her eighteenth loan, making her a loyal customer of MFP as well as one of the founders of this institution in her area. With the requested funds she will buy more beauty products on sale, something favored by any businessperson to increase profits.

Translated from Spanish by Lisette Artiga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase merchandise

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es: Felicita tiene 53 años, vive con esposo y su hijo en su casa propia. Encontró una alternativa de desarrollo en el puesto que alquiló en el mercado hace 16 años, donde vende condimentos, los cuales prepara desde tempranas horas de la mañana, gracias a la  experiencia que tiene en el preparado de estos productos, ahorra lo suficiente en el costo de producción. Luego de la preparación sale a las 5 de la mañana de su hogar para el mercado en donde atiende desde las 6 hasta las 2 de la tarde. Lo importante en esta actividad es tener listo los productos para que las madres de familia tengan lo necesario para su cocina. Pero a pesar de que le va muy bien, Felicita tiene la ambición de tener un local propio, pues paga el alquiler del puesto del mercado, lo que disminuye sus ganancias. Este es su quinceavo préstamo con MFP, y desde que ingresó trabaja muy duro en el progreso de su grupo y como persona. Con la cantidad que solicita adquirirá algunos exhibidores para sus productos, los cuales atraigan la atención de las personas y sea más concurrido su puesto de lo habitual.
texts.en:
Felicita is 53 years old, and lives with her husband and her son in her own house. For the last 16 years she has earned an income selling spices and condiments in the stall she rents at the market. She prepares these in the early hours of the morning, and thanks to her experience with these products, she saves on the production cost. After the preparation is complete, she leaves her home at 5:00 a.m. for the market where stays from 6:00 a.m. until 2:00 in the afternoon. In her business it is important to have products ready so that housewives will have essential ingredients for their cooking. But although her business is going quite well, Felicita’s ambition is to have her own place of business. This would eliminate the need to pay rent for the stall at the market, something that reduces her profits. This is her fifteenth loan with MFP, and since joining, she has worked very hard toward the group’s progress and as an individual. With the funds requested, she will acquire some exhibit cases for her products which will attract people’s attention, making her stall more frequented than usual.

Translated from Spanish by Lisette Artiga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy exhibit cases for her business.

loans.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Emilia es socia del Bancomunal Jesús de Praga.
Emilia es casada, tiene 44 años, cuatro hijos de 18 y 20 años  trabajan los de  13 y 6 años están  en el colegio.
Emilia es de departamento de Huancavelica, ella no sabe leer ni escribir, su papá no quiso que estudiara, tenia que trabajar pasteando ovejas. Pasteando conoció al que ahora es su esposo,  se caso a los quince años,  dedico a criar a sus hijos, hace cinco años una amiga la anima a trabajar cortando ají, ahora Emilia  compra  ají en la parada y reparte  a los puestos del mercado.
Emilia necesita un crédito de 2000 soles, para comprar ají panca y ají amarillo dos sacos.
Desde que comenzó en Finca, le ayudo a tener capital, puede trabajar más tranquila  
El sueño de  Emilia es techar su casa.

loans.use: Emilia necesita un crédito de 2000 soles, para comprar ají panca y ají amarillo dos sacos.

loans.name: Paulina Doris

texts.es:
La Sra: PAULINA, es socia del banco comunal, ella vive en la comunidad de Tambo real en el distrito de Zurite de la provincia de Anta, está ubicado a 1 y 40 minutos de la ciudad del Cusco; la socia tiene 29 años de edad, ella tiene 2 hijos de, 10 y 3 años.

Ella se dedica entre sus actividades domésticas a la crianza de vacas Holstein, teniendo un total de 10 vacas, las que le permiten la producción de leche fresca y sus derivados como son, quesos, quesillos, yogurt, manjar blaco, los cuales son vendidos en las ferias locales y en su mayoría llevadas a la ciudad del Cusco para venderlas en el mercado central de la ciudad.

Ella solilita el préstamo para la compra de 2 vacas holstein, y poder ampliar y mejorar su pequeño establo, para poder organizarse mejor y tener mayor producción a corto plazo.

La socia reconoce y valora de manera especial el préstamo otorgado, quedando muy agradecida y manifestando su compromiso para la pronta devolución del préstamo.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the communal bank and lives in the Tambo Real community in the Zurite district of the Anta province, which is located 1 hour and 40 minutes from the city of Cusco. She is 29 years old and has 2 children who are 10 and 3 years of age. Among her domestic activities, she works at raising Holstein cows and has 10 cows, which allow for the production of fresh milk and products such as cheese, quesillo, yogurt, and manjar blanco, which are sold at the local fairs and mostly taken to the city of Cusco to be sold at the central market. She is requesting this loan to buy 2 Holstein cows and to be able to expand and improve her small stable in order to get more organized and increase production in the short term. She recognizes the value of the loan and feels grateful and committed to quickly repaying the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Tara Binetti, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy 2 cows and expand her stable.

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi: Chị Phạm Thị T. 33 tuổi, chị đang sống tại  xã phú Cường huyện Kim động tỉnh Hưng Yên cùng chồng và 2 con nhỏ. Năm 2000 chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi. Đến nay sau 8 năm tham gia Quỹ  công việc chăn nuôi, trồng trọt của gia đình chị đã ngày càng được mở rộng và cho thu nhập khoảng 30.000.000/ năm. Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm 100 cây nhãn giống về trồng.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pham Thi T. is 33 years old. She lives at Phu Cuong Village, Kim Dong District, Hung Yen Province with her husband and two small children. in 2000 she joined TYM Fund to borrow loans to invest in livestock raising. After 8 years with TYM Fund, her livestock and orchard business expands and brings her an income of 30,000,000 VND per year. She would like to borrow 10,000,000 VND to invest in 100 seedlings to grow.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thiennga Ngo, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Growing

loans.name: Kayode

texts.en: Thirty-seven years old and married with two children, Kayode sells tyres. Hoping to expand this business, he is requesting the loan amount of N50000 to purchase more tyres to sell. He says thanks to all Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more tyres  to sell

loans.name: Eusebia

texts.es: Eusebia tiene 57 años, vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en la casa que compraron hace varios años. Se dedica a la venta de comida que prepara en su domicilio con el apoyo de su hija, quien trata en lo posible, de ayudar a su madre por las mañanas, pero de todas maneras hace falta de otra persona, pues para distribuir los menús tiene que tener un ayudante, pero no cuenta con un presupuesto para contratar un personal. Es así que se levanta muy de mañana para preparar los alimentos, lo que le toma un aproximado de tres horas, para luego salir al medio día para repartir a sus clientes. Esta actividad le toma toda una mañana y en las tardes se dedica a la venta de bebidas en su domicilio, lo cual es más descansado, pues no tiene que trasladarse, sino solo estar muy atenta a la llamada de sus clientes. Con el paso del tiempo desea tener un restaurante  donde pueda vender bebidas y comida a la vez, sin tener que hacer grandes recorridos por la ciudad. Eusebia viene trabajando en MFP hace un año, este es su segundo préstamo, lo cual le ayudó a  acrecentar su mercadería, y a relacionarse con otras personas, además, siendo la presidenta  tiene muchas responsabilidades dentro de su banco comunal. Con el dinero que solicita comprará algunas ollas y utensilios que necesita para aumentar la cantidad de comida que prepara para sus pensionistas, los cuales cada día son más.
texts.en:
Eusebia is 57 years old and lives with her husband and her four children in the house they bought several years ago. She sells food she prepares in her home with the help of her daughter, who helps her each morning. She could use an assistant to help distribute the food but does not have the budget to hire additional personnel. Therefore, she rises early every morning to prepare the food, a task that takes approximately three hours. Then she leaves at noon to deliver the food to her customers and this takes up the entire morning. In the afternoon, she sells beverages from her home, a more relaxing activity since she does not have to transport them and only needs to be on hand for her customers’ calls. In time, she wants to have a restaurant where she can sell beverages and food at the same time, without having to travel throughout the city. Eusebia has been working with MFP for a year, and this is her second loan. It has helped her increase commodities and network with others, in addition to being the president of the communal bank, with its many responsibilities. With the funds requested, she will buy pots and utensils needed to increase the quantity of food she prepares for her retired customers, which grow in number each day.

Translated from Spanish by Lisette Artiga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pots and utensils to prepare the food she sells.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es socia del Bancomunal Jesús de Praga.
Maria es conviviente, tiene 44 años, cuatro hijos de 28, 26,24, y  4 años, los mayores trabajan.
Maria y su esposo tienen un negocio de cerrajería se llama “Julio Ramos” que funciona en su casa,  ella ayuda alijar pinta.
Desde que esta en Finca ha recibido ayuda, a través de las charlas aprendió como manejar mejor su negocio, aprendió a ser comunicativa expresar sus ideas, por que era muy tímida. 
Necesita un crédito de 2200 soles para comprar fieros, soldaduras, pinturas. 
El sueño de Maria es que su negocio prospere.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank "Jesús de Praga". Maria lives with her husband. She is 44 years old and she has four children that are 28, 26, 24 and 4 years old. Her two oldest children work. Maria and her husband own a locksmith business. It is called "Julio Ramos" and they run it our of their house. Since she has been in the group Finca she has received help with her business. At the lectures she has learned how to run her business better and also how to express her ideas and to communicate better. She was very shy before. She needs a loan of $675 (2,200 Soles) to be able to purchase paints, metals and other welding materials for her business. Maria dreams that her business will prosper.

(Translated by Justin of San Roque School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: She needs a loan of $675 (2,200 Soles) to be able to purchase paints, metals and other welding materials for her business.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora tiene 64 años, es viuda y vive con sus cuatro hijos quienes son mayores de edad. Ella comenzó a vender productos de belleza desde muy joven, pero cuando se casó tuvo que dejar su actividad con la finalidad de velar por su hogar, sin embargo, la perdida de su esposo, hace siete años, la impulsó a retomar su negocio como vendedora de cosméticos donde tiene invertido gran cantidad de dinero. Cada día trata de visitar a un gran número de personas, es así, que todas las mañanas, está muy ocupada en captar nuevas clientas, lo cual le agrada ya que le gusta conocer nuevas personas y relacionarse. En el futuro Dora desea abrir un bazar en su domicilio, pues su edad no le ayuda a seguir con sus labores acostumbradas. Ella trabaja con MFP desde hace 5 años y este es su décimo préstamo, tiempo que le sirvió de mucho para ampliar sus conocimientos en cuanto a administración y organización. Dora invertirá 1500 soles en la compra de cosméticos, pues desea aprovechar las ofertas que tienen las líneas de belleza.
texts.en:
Dora is a 64-years-old widow who lives with her four grown children. She began selling beauty products when she was much younger, but when she married she left this business to be a homemaker. The loss of her husband seven years ago prompted her to again take up selling cosmetics and she has invested funds in her business. On a daily basis she visits a great number of people; every morning she works at securing new customers, something that she enjoys because she likes to meet and interact with people. In the future, Dona wants to open a shop in her home since her age will not allow her to continue indefinitely with business as usual. She has worked with MFP for 5 years and this is her tenth loan. During this time, she has increased her understanding of administration and organization. Dona will invest 1500 soles in the purchase of cosmetics, taking advantage of the sales offered by several beauty product lines.

Translated from Spanish by Lisette Artiga, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase her merchandise.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina  es socia del Bancomunal Jesús de Praga.
Paulina es conviviente, tiene 29 años, un hijo de 9 años, que esta en el colegio estatal.    
No pudo estudiar por que a los 14 años  se enfermo de ataques de epilepsia, comenzó trabajando en casas haciendo de todo, hasta que consiguió un trabajo pelando ají 30 kilos diarios. Se dedica a comprar ají y los pela, y reparte en el mercado.   
Desde que esta en Finca pudo empezar su negocio, y le esta yendo bien 
Necesita un crédito de 3000 soles, para  la compra de sacos de ají, en la parada. 
El sueño de Paulina es cambiar de negocio, poner un taller de  mecánica, pintado de carro.
texts.en:
Paulina is a member of the communal bank Jesús de Praga. She lives with her husband and she is 29 years old. She has a son that is 9 years old and he goes to a public school. She was not able to complete her education because when she was 14 she became ill with Epilepsy. She started to work in private homes doing all kind of work. Then she got a job peeling 30 kilograms of chile peppers a day. She makes a living buying chile peppers, peeling them and taking them to the marketplaces to be sold. Since she has been in the group Finca, she has been able to start her own business and she is doing very well. She needs a loan of $925 so that she can buy huge sacks of chile peppers. Paulina's dream is to be able to change businesses one day and to start a shop that specializes in painting cars.

(Translated by Nathan of San Roque School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: She needs a loan of $925 so that she can buy huge sacks of chile peppers.

loans.name: Duong Thi

texts.vi: Chị Dương Thị Hà, năm nay 37 tuổi, ở Kim Động. Chồng chị mất sớm và chị phải nuôi hai con nhỏ còn đang đi học. Chị tham gia Quỹ từ năm 2004, với số vốn vay ban đầu là 500.000 đ đầu tư vào bán hàng ăn sáng. Hiện tại chị Hà đang kinh doanh nước giải khát, đây cũng là công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị  với thu nhập 2.000.000đ/ tháng . Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay thêm 10.000.000 để mua thêm hàng về bán nhằm mở rộng  quy mô kinh doanh tăng thu nhập cho gia đình
texts.en:
Mrs. Duong Thi H. is 37 years old, living in Kim Dong. Her husband passed away early, and she is left raising two small school aged children. She joined TYM Fund in 2004. Her first loan was 500,000 VND to invest in a breakfast food stand. Currently, she sells refreshment, which gives her family an income of 2,000,000 VND per month. She would like to borrow 10,000,000 VND to buy more supplies to expand her business, and increase the source of income for her family.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thiennga Ngo, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es: Candelaria tiene 66 años, vive sola desde hace más de 10 años en su casa propia. Ella es una mujer que desde los 20 años viene trabajando en multiples actividades, pero desde hace 10 años empezó a vender ropa en los diferentes mercados de su distrito, es más rentable vender en zonas alejadas, pues las personas no tienen fácil acceso para trasladarse a la ciudad para comprar, y en otros casos cuentan con muy escasos recursos economicos. Pero para ser de ayuda a sus vecinos, Candelaria trata de adquirir diversas prendas de las mismas fábricas, donde compra al por mayor y puede vender a sus clientes a precios bajos. En el futuro desea poner una tienda donde pueda vender sus prendas y otros productos para estar a tiempo completo al servicio de sus clientes, ya que son la única  compañía que tiene. Candelaria tiene 6 años trabajando con MFP, y espera seguir junto a la institución que le brindó apoyo cuando más lo necesitaba. Con el dinero que solicita comprará uniformes, ya que es época escolar y quiere aprovechar esta campaña.
texts.en:
Candelaria is 66 years old. She has lived alone for more than 10 years in her own home. She is a woman who since the age of 20 has worked in several activities, but for the past 10 years she has begun selling clothes in the different markets in her District. It is more profitable to sell in the further zones, because the people there don’t have easy access to travel to the city to shop, and in other cases they have very restricted economic resources. But in order to help her neighbors, Candelaria tries to have various items from the same factories, where she buys for a better price and sells to her clients at lower prices. In the future, she wants to have a store where she could sell her items and other products in order to be on time completing services for her clients, at the moment this is the only company that she has. Candelaria has spent 6 years working with MFP, and she hopes to continue with the institution that gives her help when she needs it most. With the money that she is asking for she would buy uniforms, as it is currently time for school and she wants to try this business.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase her merchandise

loans.name: Akin

texts.en: Akin A., 35 years old and married with two children, sells clothes in Ibadan, Oyo State, Nigeria. He is requesting the loan amount of 100,000 to purchase more clothes to sell. He says thanks to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To purchase more clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Alejandra

texts.es:
Maria es socia del Bancomunal Jesús de Praga.
Maria es conviviente, tiene 40 años, cinco hijos de 24, 20 y 18,  ellos trabajan,  no viven con Maria, el  8 y 5 años están en la escuela estatal.  
No pudo terminar de estudiar el colegio por que su mama se queda viuda  y tuvo que trabajar. Empezó comprando y vendiendo ropa  de segunda,  alquilo un puesto en el mercado señor de justicia, vende ropa nueva en las afueras del hospital Maria Auxiliadora.      
Maria necesita un crédito de 1200 soles, para comprar pantalones en Av. Grau.
En Finca recibió crédito para comprar mercadería, aprendió a trabajar mas, a ser responsable con sus pagos y como trabajar el dinero.    
El sueño de Maria es tener un puesto de ropa y llevar mercadería a provincia.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the communal bank Jesús de Praga. Maria is 40 years old and she has 5 children. Her children that are 24, 20 and 18 years old work and they do not live with Maria. Her youngest children, ages 8 and 5, are public school students. Maria was not able to finish her education because her mom was widowed and Maria had to start working. Maria started buying ansd selling secondhand clothing to make a living. She rented out a space in the "Señor de Justicia" marketplace and she sells clothing outside of the Maria Auxiliadora Hospital. Maria needs a loan of $375 (1,200 Soles) to be able to purchase pairs of pants on Grau Avenue to sell. In the group Finca Maria has received loans to buy more merchandise and she has learned to work more and to be responsible about making her payments. She has learned how to handle money better. Maria's dream is to have a clothing store and to take merchandise to provincial areas to sell.

(Translated by Dorian of San Roque School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Maria needs a loan of $375 (1,200 Soles) to be able to purchase pants to sell.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: Bertha tiene 39 años, es casada vive con su esposo y sus hijas en la casa que compraron desde que se casó. Siempre tuvo un apego especial hacia los animales y desde hace 10 años trabaja criando cerdos en las afueras de su localidad, que por motivos de higiene le impide hacerlo dentro de su casa. Es por eso que su trabajo recogiendo los baldes de restos de comida que sus vecinos juntan y esperan a las 5 de la tarde para que doña Bertha los recolecte. Estas sobras son calentadas y preparadas la mañana siguiente en su casa, de ahí se moviliza hasta su criadero de cerdos. Esta actividad suele ser muy difícil, debido a la fuerza que tiene que emplear al trasladar la gran cantidad de comida. En el futuro Bertha desea aumentar la cantidad de animales que tiene que son su capital de trabajo, pues es la única actividad que aprendió desde niña y le agrada realizar. Ella viene trabajando con MFP desde hace 5 años, pues está en su décimo préstamo y está muy contenta por formar parte de un equipo tan trabajador y colaborador. El dinero que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de cerdos que piensa engordar y luego vender a los carniceros.
texts.en:
Bertha is 39 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and her children in the home that they bought when they were married. She has always had a special affection for animals, and since she was 10 years old she has worked raising pigs in the outskirts of her neighborhood, as reasons of hygene prevent her from having them inside her house. It is for this reason that she works carrying buckets for the scraps of food that her neighbors collect. They wait until 5 in the afternoon for Ms. Bertha to collect them. These scraps are heated and prepared the following morning in her home, and then she takes them to her pigsty. This work can be very difficult, due to the strength that she has to use to move the large quantities of food. In the future, Bertha wants to increase the number of animals that she has, using her working capital, as it is the only activity that she learned as a child and that she can do. She has worked with MFP for 5 years, and this is her tenth loan, and she is very happy to be part of a team so hardworking and collaborating. The money that she is asking for would be invested in the purchase of pigs that she would fatten and later sell to the butchers.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de cerdos

loans.name: Carmen Martha

texts.es:
Carmen es socia del Bancomunal Jesús D. Praga.
Carmen es casada, tiene 47 años, tiene cinco hijos 31, 29, 27,  23 y 17 años que estudia ingles.
Hace cinco años Carmen y su esposo tienen un puesto D.  ferretería en el mercado  asociación señor D. justicia por pista nueva, allí venD. toda clase D. herramientas, su esposo D. Carmen brinda servicios D.  gasfiteria.
Carmen necesita un préstamo D. 1600 soles, para la compra D. herramientas D. segunda. 
DesD. que esta en Finca pueD. comprar mas mercadería, aprendió a ahorrar, ha no gastar mas D. lo que no tiene. 
El sueño D. Carmen es que su negocio crezca y abrir una bodega
texts.en:
Carmen is a member of the communal bank Jesús D. Praga. Carmen is married and she is 47 years old. She has 5 children that are ages 31, 29, 27, 23 y 17. Her youngest child studies English. Five years ago Carmen and her husband started selling tools at a stand in a marketplace. There they sold all types of tools. Her husband also offers plumbing services. Carmen needs a loan of $500 (1,600 Soles) to be able to purchase secondhand tools to sell. Since Carmen has been in the group Finca she has been able to buy more merchandise and she has learned to save and to no spend more that necessary. Carmen's dream is that her business grows and that he is able to open a store.

(Translated by Serena of San Roque School)

Translated from Spanish by Kendra Gaete, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Carmen needs a loan of $500 (1,600 Soles) to be able to purchase secondhand tools to sell.

loans.name: Pham Thi

texts.vi: Chị Phạm Thị Hạnh, 53 tuổi ở Kim Động. Chị đang sống cùng 3 người con đã trưởng thành tại huyện Kim động tỉnh Hưng Yên. Chị tham gia Quỹ từ năm 1999 và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi lợn. Sau một thời gian vừa làm vừa học hỏi thêm kinh nghiệm kinh doanh của chị em trong Cụm chị đã chuyển sang buôn bán thịt lợn. Hiện nay với mức thu nhập ổn định 2.500.000 từ việc buôn bán thịt và sự giúp đỡ của các con đã trưởng thành  kinh tế gia đình chị đang ngày càng ổn định và phát triển hơn. Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000 để tiếp tục đầu tư cho công việc buôn bán thịt lợn.
texts.en:
Mrs. Pham Thi H. is 53 years old. She lives with three grown children at Kim Dong District, Hung Yen Province. She joined in 1999 to invest in raising pigs. After learning tricks of the trade from members of her loan group, she switched to selling pork. Currently, her business brings her an income of 2,500,000 VND. With the additional financial help from her children, her family's economy is becoming stable and gradually expanding.
